name: Hellenica
description: In this puzzle RPG, explore a steam-powered ancient Greece as Artemis' bear warrior on a mythological quest of technology and magic. Push, toss, and bounce friend and foe, and use the environment to your advantage. You choose the battles, allies, and plots you encounter.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP SP2+ Memory: 1 GB RAM DirectX: Version 9.0c Storage: 600 MB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 10 Memory: 2 GB RAM DirectX: Version 9.0c Storage: 600 MB available space
